name: Popeye 3D
description:
READ! 🛑IF YOU GET STUCK, JUMP! 😁

Popeye NES game remade using 3D. This is a demo project made for a YouTube video.

Objetive:

Popeye -> Pick up hearts and avoid Brutus.

Brutus -> Catch Popeye

Controls:

Recommended playing using gamepads for both players.

Keyboard:

Popeye: WASD / Space (Jump)

Brutus: Arrow Keys / L (Jump)
